alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Crook (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued February 23 at 1:48PM MST until February 24 at 9:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. * WHERE...In South Dakota, Harding County, Perkins County, Butte County, the Northern Meade County Plains and the Southern Meade County Plains. In Wyoming, Northeastern Crook County. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 9 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: A Wind Chill Warning means the combination of wind and cold temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. Even if you are outdoors for just a few minutes, cover all parts of your body, especially your head, face, and hands.
